mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.true_name AS "trueName", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.out_type AS "outType", a.out_date AS "outDate", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.hour_total AS "hourTotal", a.out_status AS "outStatus", a.reason AS "reason", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o3.name AS "office.name"
